entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
